decisions.cost_analysis: Reroute cost: ₹525 (35×₹15). Revenue saved: ₹297,672.45 (35×₹8495.87 avg amount × 0.02 margin). Net: +₹297,147.45
decisions.reasoning: CFO perspective: Excellent ROI with ₹297,147.45 net benefit—clearly profitable intervention. CTO perspective: 100% failure rate affecting high-value customers for 2 hours violates our 99.5% SLA commitment. Pattern stability indicates systemic HDFC issue, making reroute to Razorpay likely to succeed. Moderator synthesis: Unanimous decision—both financial profitability and operational reliability perspectives strongly align.
